string.name: name
string.value: A Black Shadow in the Pig Farm
I'll need to talk to Agent #b#p1103001##k of #m100000000#, who seems to have some new information to share.

#p1103001#, who claims black shadows have been spotted all around #b#m100020000##k, asked me if I could investigate the forest in East. He told me to #broam around my mouse cursor until I can click on something, then click on it#k.
I reported the suspicious black shadow hidden in the forest that I spotted to #p1103001#.

I have just received a big news! I can't disclose the name, but a girl in #m100010000# allegedly found a group of suspicious shadows moving in #b#m100020000##k. Doesn't that sound questionable? I think it's something we should look into!
I want you to go into #m100020000# and search the grassy areas, especially the ones in between the weeds and thickets. If you can find anything, ANYTHING, let me know, okay?

Just in case you are not sure how to search for things... #buse your cursor to roam around the screen until you find something you can click on. When you spot something, you can click on it immediately#k.
Eh? Doesn't it sound suspicious enough? Other than that, I haven't received much information on Black Mage...

So you spotted a black shadow in between the forest? Ahh... it would have been nice if we could have captured him. But if it is indeed one of Black Mage's men, then there's no way he would have been caught that easily.
Thank you so much for your help! I'll be here to check on them continually, so I want you to keep training until the next big mission comes up, okay?
